entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8.
